text: Inscribed with hex-breaking runes in ancient Reikspiel, Faithrend is Aelfricâ€™s infamous blade. Some say it weeps when sorcery is near, others that it drinks the essence of the damned. Whatever the truth, none who have wielded Chaos have survived its edge.
After battles against the forces of Man, there is a chance that Ice Wolves will heed the call and join your host, if space allows.
Has access to several additional Tzeentch agents
